review: After deciding to purchase this product due to an upcoming move in which we are hoping to cut cable, I could not be more happy with the Fire TV stick. It is super easy to set up, very user friendly and the remote is possibly the most functional and comfortable to use that I've ever owned. I love all of the streaming options that are available with this product. The only con I can think of is not having one for each TV, so if we want to continue to watch a show in another room, we have to move the stick and power supply. But, we plan on getting a second stick soon since this one has worked out so well! Love our new Fire TV Stick!
